ing: 3 large apples, cored and sliced with peel
des: "Red apple slices baked in a caramel sauce with a hint of spice.  Substitute cloves for cinnamon, if you like."
ins:
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Place sliced apples in shallow baking dish and cover with caramel sauce.  Sprinkle with cinnamon.
Bake in preheated oven 20 minutes, until just tender.
